description:
Handheld X-Ray H.E. (Halloween Edition)

You Know, For The Kids.

Now with over 20 Alternate Endings/Monsters.
http://goo.gl/164f or http://goo.gl/N8lu

Available for the Palm Pre just in time for Halloween. This App uses your smartphone's X-Ray camera to check for broken hands, and to see whether or not your pals are really human. 

Fool your BFFs & Frenemies with this Prank App.

This hand scan was made possible by master artist cubeFX from PreCentral.net's Forum. Please do a search on cubeFX in PreCentral's Forum to see the outstanding work done by him.

Tell others that this app uses your phone's little known x-ray feature/functionality. 

Not only will you see the bones within you right hand. This app allows you to scan your friends' true identity by taking their picture and processing the image within seconds. There are four secret invisible buttons on each corner of the Analyze Photo scene that allows you to switch the outcome of the scan. 

Choose between Vampire, Cyborg, Monster, and even your own scary custom result picture. Plus you can always have a normal human skeleton show up in case you are the one being scanned.

Put your custom image (GIF format 480 width X 320 height;  image name = myxray.gif ) in media/internal/XRayApp/myxray.gif when in USB mode.

Top Reviews from test version:

5Stars
Flipped out my kids with this good times

5Stars
My wife totally just fell for this! So 5 stars for this!!! Haha.

5Stars
My 6 year old loves it. The app does what it says it does.

5Stars
Great app, works perfect, just gotta get a feel for moving the phone in sync with the video, and your set!

Tue, Oct 05 08:35:00 UTC 2010
